controlData.tooltip: Explicitly enable/disable this Step, allowing the mappable to skip it entirely. ENABLED if not specified.
Prevent the mappable from advancing past this Step

Enabling this will Hold any outputs (e.g. key or mouse button) while the input (e.g. hotkey, click bar button) is held
If not specified, the Mappable Sheet's value will be used.
Enabling this feature will generally lock the cursor into the window
Enabling this feature will block VFX Sources from the Character's window
Enabling this feature will prevent broadcast inputs from reaching the window
Enabled by default, this applies any default game-specific Virtual Files
Enabling this will Hold any outputs (e.g. key or mouse button) while the input (e.g. hotkey, click bar button) is held
